The new links are the same ‘color coding’ as before (ie. Yellow is kornacki, purple is Chuck Todd, production staff should know which link talent will be using) but with different URLs. The shortcuts are already on the desktop so please load as usual – the original links are located on the desktop in a folder named ‘OLD_INTERACTIVE_LINKS_6-14-2021.’ In case of emergencies you can also find the links here, with shortcuts for x86 and x64 depending on where Chrome is installed (Program Files, or Program Files (x86)) https://nbcuni.sharepoint.com/:f:/s/GFXTechnology/Erz06iiGktJJnW-nSwna1vkBpZn8fgCRsZVk-_Utlrpiig?e=E79IUf Contact me if you have any questions. Thanks, Enzo Sangiorgio 646-509-3591 "										100.103.244.94 		Teal – Clint Watts												 		White – Savannah Sellers												 		Purple – Chuck												 														 The following routes are locked.														 SDO 3A CC 100 IN and 3A BSP 404														 SDO 4E CC 100 IN and RTR 3N 046														 SDO 4ETS CC 100 IN and RTR 3N 053														 SDO 3AW CC 100 IN and RTR 3N 037														 SDO 3B CC 34 IN and 3B BSP 402														  														 IMPORTANT NOTE:														 The 3AW app is locked in the 3AW NORTH position.														 If you move the PPI to the South position, you will see the APP, but you won't have color correction over the monitor.
